channel.title: spring-data-neo4j on Jennifer Reif
channel.description: Recent content in spring-data-neo4j on Jennifer Reif

item.title: NoSuchBeanDefinitionException: No matching TransactionManager bean found for qualifier 'reactiveTransactionManager'
item.description: Photo credit I was working on a Spring Data Neo4j microservice application to add a write method for saving a new book review to the database, when I came across the error message below. org.springframework.beans.factory.NoSuchBeanDefinitionException: No bean named 'reactiveTransactionManager' available: No matching TransactionManager bean found for qualifier 'reactiveTransactionManager' - neither qualifier match nor bean name match! The stacktrace was long and ugly, and I had come across this error before…​but I could not remember how I had solved it.
